bug.author: grafandreas
bug.summary: Packing on Win / Filenames too long
bug.description: Dear all, having got the build finally running, UR editor opens Carla. I was trying to build a standalone by using "packaging->win64" and get errors while "cooking". Going through the logs I find: CookResults: Error: Couldn't save package, filename is too long: D:/git/carla/carla/Unreal/CarlaUE4/Saved/Cooked/WindowsNoEditor/CarlaUE4/Content/Carla/Static/Pedestrians/Materials/Textures/ModelBased/femaleSkirtShirt/Female_Skirt_Shirt_SBoots_femaleDummy2_hair_mat_OcclusionRoughnessMetallic.uasset A Windows Classic! Has anyone every packaged on WIndows 10? If so, what is your root level where you put git / carla etc. (I have long filename paths enabled in Win10, BTW). Thanks, Andreas

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/grafandreas>@grafandreas</denchmark-link> , It's not your computer problem. When packing, Unreal has a maximum file length of 260, that sometimes, <denchmark-link:https://answers.unrealengine.com/questions/60187/the-path-to-the-asset-is-too-long-for-cooking-im-l.html>fails</denchmark-link> anyway. My only suggestion is that you should work in for now. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TheNihilisticRobot>@TheNihilisticRobot</denchmark-link> is working on it but renaming assets is not easy because it must be done inside Unreal Editor and looks like it must be done by hand. Anyway, it's true that we have inconsistent and redundant paths/naming on certain files of our project like:
Filenames ended in OcclusionRoughnessMetallic.uasset that can be changed to something like ORM.uasset. Also other image types like _Normal to _n and so on.
Repeated filenames like: see Bl_House_SantaClaraSuburb009 Bl_House_SantaClaraSuburb009_Bl_House_SantaClaraSuburb009_Frames_OcclusionRoughnessMetallic.uasset
Redundant folders and filenames like: see FemaleSkinnyJeans and Female_SkinnyJeans FemaleSkinnyJeans/Female_SkinnyJeans_Tshirt_Boots_femaleDummy3_bottom_mat_OcclusionRoughnessMetallic.uasset
Inconsistent id naming like: see 9 and 009 .../SntaClara_SuburbHouse_9/1024/Bl_House_SantaClaraSuburb009_Bl_House_SantaClaraSuburb009_Walls_OcclusionRoughnessMetallic.uasset
Different naming styles (CamelCase, pascalCase, ...) like: see ModelBased, femaleDress, Female_Dress and shoes_mat .../Textures/ModelBased/femaleDress/Female_Dress_Shoes_femaleDummy1_shoes_mat_Normal.uasset
I'm sure at some point the artist team will rename everything correctly! Cheers
